Desc.eng: Guests! Finally! You came to taste my specialties, didn't you? I ran out of ingredients, so I can only prepare one meal. But that will change the way you think about food.
It sounds slightly unnerving. What's on the menu?
Well, you can choose Domovoy Steak, Vrikolak Pie or Vodyanoy Haggis!
Domovoy Steak? That soundsâ€¦ exotic. I'll have one.
Vrikolak Pie? That sounds like a delicacy. Yes, please.
Vodyanoy Haggis must be a real Borgovian treat. I'll take it.
They all sound disgusting and rather unhealthy. No, thank you.
